title: Independent Missouri Senate candidate: "I'm a common-sense conservative, but I also believe in democracy"
description: Sen. Roy Blunt's (R-Mo.) retirement next term triggered a crowded Republican field to replace him. Embroiled former Gov. Eric Greitens leads the pack, but candidacies like John Wood's seem to present a middle ground on the right, away from the extremes of election denialism. He joins Chuck to pitch his candidacy and to discuss the strength of the institutions surrounding voting and lawmaking.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
